name: The Stalking of You
description:
This game was created using Twine2 in 2017.
It's now 2020 and I'm ready to try making more games.
It's only now I realise it's been set in draft this whole time lol

It was a challenge/attempt to keep the word count under 300.
Pretty sure I went over that.

You're being stalked. Who is it?

To play: Click "DAY ONE" to begin the story.
